bill.summary:
Medicaid Health Homes for Opioid-Use-Disorder Medicaid Enrollees Encouraged Act or the Medicaid Health HOME Act
This bill extends the enhanced federal matching rate for expenditures regarding substance-use disorder health-home services under Medicaid.
